trans-unit.resname: SOK·1 | Aether Shockwave | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The strain upon the veil between worlds began to show near the end of the Kami War. Strange happenings that neither side could control lashed out across Kamigawa."\n—*Observations of the Kami War*
trans-unit.target: 「逆神之战终盘时，两界帘幕逐渐绷紧。 神河全境不断发生诸般异事，任一方皆无法控制。」 ～逆神之战侧记

trans-unit.resname: SOK·32 | Cut the Earthly Bond | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target enchanted permanent to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标被结附的永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: SOK·32 | Cut the Earthly Bond | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The more kami that passed through the veil that separated them from our world, the weaker that veil became, threatening to tear into tatters at the slightest pressure."\n—*The History of Kamigawa*
trans-unit.target: 「随着更多神明穿帘而至，两界间的帘幕也更加脆弱，好象再受一点压力便将化作败絮。」 ～神河通史

trans-unit.resname: SOK·33 | Descendant of Soramaro | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Descendant of Soramaro
trans-unit.target: 空麻吕后裔

trans-unit.resname: SOK·33 | Descendant of Soramaro | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of cards in your hand, then put them back in any order.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}：检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为你的手牌数量，然后将它们以任意顺序放回。

trans-unit.resname: SOK·33 | Descendant of Soramaro | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Soramaro speaks through me. Listen! And I will tell the wisdom of the ancestors."
trans-unit.target: 「空麻吕藉我传言。 注意听！ 我将传述先祖的智慧。」

trans-unit.resname: SOK·34 | Dreamcatcher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dreamcatcher
trans-unit.target: 捕梦怪

trans-unit.resname: SOK·34 | Dreamcatcher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you play a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may sacrifice CARDNAME. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你使用精怪或古咒咒语时，你可以牺牲CARDNAME。 若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: SOK·34 | Dreamcatcher | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Be careful where your mind wanders. Even in the quietest moments, the kami are listening, and your thoughts give them shape."\n—Lady Azami
trans-unit.target: 「莫让思绪随处漫游。 神明能聆听最低微的声响，人们的思想也能赋予他们形体。」 ～蓟夫人

trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当此回合使用了第四个咒语时，将CARDNAME倒转。

trans-unit.source: Search target opponent's library for an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card. Put that card into play under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.\nEpic (For the rest of the game, you can't play spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)
trans-unit.target: 从目标对手的牌库中搜寻一张神器，生物，结界，或地牌， 并将该牌在你的操控下放置进场。 然后该牌手将其牌库洗牌。 历传（这盘游戏结束之前，你不能使用咒语。 在你每回合的维持开始时，复制此咒语，但不包含其历传异能。 你可以为该复制选择新的目标。）

(Spells without mana costs can't be played.)
Draw a card.
CARDNAME is blue.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you play an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

trans-unit.resname: SOK·40 | Ideas Unbound | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The apprentice stared in puzzlement. "But Master, you finished writing those spells just yesterday. Don't you remember?" The jushi's heart froze.
trans-unit.target: 学徒狐疑地盯着。 「大师，您昨天才写完这几个咒语。 您忘了吗？」术士心底打了个冷颤。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张瞬间牌，并将它们移出对战。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。 {X}，{T}：你可以使用以歌穗移出对战、总法术力费用为X的一张牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: "He's a lot like me, that masterless little kami . . . unimpressed by grandeur and never at a loss for a trick."\n—Toshiro Umezawa
trans-unit.target: 「这无主神明倒很像我. . . 貌不惊人，诡计多端。」 ～梅泽俊郎

trans-unit.source: "I feel their unnatural influence in the weary, weeping land. Do they care nothing for the creatures who walk below their clouds?"\n—Eight-and-a-Half-Tails
trans-unit.target: 「我感到大地因他们违逆自然的影响力而逐渐虚弱。 他们难道对云底生灵毫不关心？」 ～八尾半

trans-unit.source: {4}: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. Sacrifice CARDNAME at end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {4}：目标生物得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为该生物的力量。 在回合结束时，将CARDNAME牺牲。

trans-unit.resname: SOK·161 | Wine of Blood and Iron | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Godo never revealed what went into his special brew, but he always had more of it after great victories.
trans-unit.target: 伍堂从不透露其酿造法，只晓得他在大胜后都会多喝些。

trans-unit.resname: SOK·162 | Mikokoro, Center of the Sea | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mikokoro, Center of the Sea
trans-unit.target: 海中天地御心

trans-unit.resname: SOK·162 | Mikokoro, Center of the Sea | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{2}, {T}: Each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {2}，{T}：每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: SOK·162 | Mikokoro, Center of the Sea | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Center of the Sea, Eye of the World, Shrine of Enlightenment. Seek it for answers. Seek it for healing. Seek it and return transformed."\n—Scroll fragment from the ruins of Minamo
trans-unit.target: 「御心是汪洋的中心，世界的眼睛，启蒙的殿堂。 该地有所有问题的解答， 所有伤痛的解药。 之后你将超凡而归。」～水面院废墟的断简残篇

trans-unit.resname: SOK·163 | Miren, the Moaning Well | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Miren, the Moaning Well
trans-unit.target: 悲井未练

trans-unit.resname: SOK·163 | Miren, the Moaning Well | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {3}，{T}，牺牲一个生物：你获得等同于所牺牲之生物防御力的生命。

trans-unit.resname: SOK·164 | Oboro, Palace in the Clouds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oboro, Palace in the Clouds
trans-unit.target: 云殿胧宫

trans-unit.resname: SOK·164 | Oboro, Palace in the Clouds | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.\n{1}: Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{U}到你的法术力池中。 {1}：将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: SOK·164 | Oboro, Palace in the Clouds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Here the soratami wove their endless plots—graceful, artful, and deceitful, while the unwitting world moved below.
trans-unit.target: 空民诸般优雅、美妙与欺瞒的阴谋均于此织成；而无辜大地在底下如常运行。

trans-unit.resname: SOK·165 | Tomb of Urami | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tomb of Urami
trans-unit.target: 乌罗未之墓

trans-unit.resname: SOK·165 | Tomb of Urami | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. CARDNAME deals 1 damage to you if you don't control an Ogre.\n{2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice all lands you control: Put a legendary 5/5 black Demon Spirit creature token with flying named Urami into play.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{B}到你的法术力池中。 如果你未操控食人魔，CARDNAME对你造成1点伤害。 {2}{B}{B}，{T}，牺牲所有由你操控的地：将一个5/5黑色，名称为乌罗未，具飞行异能的传奇恶魔／精怪衍生物放置进场。
